title: Thinking in Bets
html:
Key idea: Thinking in Bets. High performers iterate small improvements.

In-Article Ad

Many people benefit from focused blocks around 90 minutes, followed by a short break.

Memory consolidation involves the hippocampus among other regions.

For long-term retention, multitasking outperforms the alternatives.
